# Homogeneous Poisson Process

## Class

```{r}
pois_y <- hpp(lambda = 1)

pois_y
```


## Simulate

```{r}
events <- simulatehpp(lambda = 1, end = 10)
events

```


## Fit

```{r}

hppmle(events)

```




## Plot

```{r}
plothpp_step(events)
```
```{r}
drawHPPIntensity(pois_y,color = "red")
```

# Hawkes Process


## Simulate

```{r}
simulatehp(lambda0 = 0.1, alpha = 0.5, beta = 0.5, start = 0, end = 10,
           history = 0)

```


## Fit


```{r}
sample_events <- readRDS("time.RDS")
initial <- c(0.5,0.5,0.5)
fit_values <- fithp(vec = initial,t = sample_events, termination = max(sample_events))

fit_values

```


## Plot

```{r}
drawHPIntensity(object = fit_values, hawkes_time =  sample_events)
```

# MMHP

## Plot

```{r}
Q <- matrix(c(-0.4, 0.4, 0.2, -0.2), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
x <- mmhp(Q, delta = c(1 / 3, 2 / 3), 
          lambda0 = 0.2,
          lambda1 = .75,
          alpha = 0.1,
          beta = 0.2)
y <- simulatemmhp(x,nsim = 5)
drawUniMMHPIntensity(x, y)
```
